caller_intent: Daniel Wilson wants to have Amani (another agent) call him back after being referred by Christopher Cook, who previously left a voicemail. He provides his phone number for this purpose.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the referral from Christopher Cook and confirms the need for Amani to contact Daniel.
Agent verifies the provided phone number (336-287-3096) and agrees to relay the request to Amani.
Agent assures Daniel that Amani will be informed to initiate a callback.
knowledge_required: Referral handling procedures within the agency
Internal communication protocols for transferring client requests between agents
summary: Daniel Wilson refers a call to Amani after being directed by Christopher Cook. He provides his contact information, and the agent agrees to coordinate with Amani to arrange a callback. The conversation is brief but clearly outlines the need for a follow-up.
